divs: Sighting Detailst was the darkest point of the night. The stars were so bright because there were no clouds. Saw what looked like a cloud reflecting light but it was actually a black triangle that made no noise. lights on the bottom randomly flashed
trends: There have been 67 other sightings in Louisville

Summary: It was the darkest point of the night. The stars were so bright because there were no clouds. Saw what looked like a cloud reflecting light but it was actually a black triangle that made no noise. lights on the bottom randomly flashed
